entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 27 this afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 30 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 27 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 40 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Thursday 09 March 2023
